price: Sọ pé: “Ṣé ẹ̀ ń jọ́sìn fún lẹ́yìn Allāhu ohun tí kò ní ìkápá ìnira àti àǹfààní kan fún yín? Allāhu, Òun sì ni Olùgbọ́, Onímọ̀.”
arabic: قُلۡ أَتَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَمۡلِكُ لَكُمۡ ضَرّٗا وَلَا نَفۡعٗاۚ وَٱللَّهُ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qul ataʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi mā lā yamliku lakum ḍarran walā nafʿan wal-lahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
